_header: A prince is clad in clothes of dule
Subjects: Christ, sufferings of; sermons, verse in; Crucifixion
_description: On the crucifixion — one quatrain in a Good Friday sermon

Bod859.Transcription:
A prince is clad in cloþȝ of delfor þe deþ of
                    hijs makeþer nys no tonge þat ay tellewat wo he suffrid for
                    her sake
Bod859.Note: Second occurrence, copied in the margin, with variants.
